title: First game in a month
body:
Enemy Yasuo (which is pathetic enough) is spamming his mastery emote every half a second. I am so glad you can now irritate people with that high pitched 'twing'. Good job, Riot.

Also, despite my connection being perfectly fine, I spiked from 45 ping to 220 - 300 with no reason. The very next game, I was back down to 45. Thank you for lagging me to hell and back for just. One. Game. I am glad I had this experience to turn me back off this game, future Eve update or not.
